[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview-decoder](./harp-mapview-decoder.md) &gt; [TileDataSource](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasource.md)

## TileDataSource class

Common base class for the typical \[\[DataSource\]\] which uses an \[\[ITileDecoder\]\] to decode the tile content asynchronously. The decoder can be passed in as an option, or a default asynchronous one is generated.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TileDataSource<TileType extends Tile> extends DataSource 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(m\_tileFactory, m\_options)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasource._constructor_.md) |  | Set up the <code>TileDataSource</code>. |

|  [logger](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasource.logger.md) |  | [ILogger](./harp-utils.ilogger.md) |  |

The \[\[Tile\]\] will be empty, but the download and decoding will be scheduled immediately. \[\[Tile\]\] instance is initialized with default copyrights, concatenated with copyrights from copyright provider of this data source. |
